desc_content.paragraph: Material data-block to define the appearance of geometric objects for rendering
A pixel is rendered only if its alpha value is above this threshold
Animation data for this data-block
Blend Mode for Transparent Faces

list_item.paragraph: OPAQUE Opaque, Render surface without transparency.
ADD Additive, Render surface and blend the result with additive blending.
MULTIPLY Multiply, Render surface and blend the result with multiplicative blending.
CLIP Alpha Clip, Use the alpha threshold to clip the visibility (binary visibility).
HASHED Alpha Hashed, Use noise to dither the binary visibility (works well with multi-samples).
BLEND Alpha Blend, Render polygon transparent, depending on alpha channel of the texture.

desc_content.paragraph: Cycles material settings
Diffuse color of the material

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Grease pencil color settings for material
True if this material has grease pencil data
Line color used for Freestyle line rendering

field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [0, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: The line color of a higher priority is used at material boundaries
Amount of mirror reflection for raytrace
Node tree for node based materials
Index of active texture paint slot
Index of clone texture paint slot
Index number for the “Material Index” render pass
Type of preview render

list_item.paragraph: SPHERE_A World Sphere, Large sphere with sky.

desc_content.paragraph: Approximate the thickness of the object to compute two refraction event (0 is disabled)
Roughness of the material
Limit transparency to a single layer (avoids transparency sorting problems)
Specular color of the material

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [0, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: How intense (bright) the specular reflection is
Texture images used for texture painting
Texture slots defining the mapping and influence of textures
Shadow method for transparent material

list_item.paragraph: NONE None, Material will cast no shadow.
OPAQUE Opaque, Material will cast shadows without transparency.
CLIP Clip, Use the alpha threshold to clip the visibility (binary visibility).
HASHED Hashed, Use noise to dither the binary visibility and use filtering to reduce the noise.

desc_content.paragraph: Use shader nodes to render the material
Use raytraced screen space refractions
Add translucency effect to subsurface

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
